channel.title: QuidQuo
channel.description: QuidQuo is committed to shining a cleansing light to restore ethics and integrity to politics.

item.title: The Campaign Finance Search Tool
item.description: QuidQuo.org features a tool that will help you uncover how much money Iowa politicians have received, who they have received that money from, and which candidates Iowa companies...

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Welcome to the QuidQuo.org blog, where I will highlight interesting Campaign Finance-related findings, like what companies and entities are lobbying for Iowa legislation and how much they have contributed to...
